Comment: Fuck Kelly Ayotte. Joyce Craig barely put up a fight during the last election, and it should have been a home run. She let all those thugs pin homelessness and the opioid epidemic on her, which, if you live in NH, I know that’s  been an issue for decades and has been exacerbated by Republicans.   Ayotte was literally contradicting herself on every single issue on top of being a pro-Trump stooge. New Hampshire is going to struggle considering where a lot of our tourism money comes from; Canada.
Author: Skippypal

Comment: I guess these governors forgot that there is a border?  That border is controlled by Trump's CBP and Canada's CBSA.  We all know CBSA isn't the issue here.    So I hope they can enlighten me as to how they propose "travel and trade" would work.
Author: Postom
